data.title: Ce film allemand est tres tris in English with examples
data.meta_description: Contextual translation of "ce film allemand est tres triste" into English. Human translations with examples: it's very, it's very sad, it is very good, c'est tres belle.
data.text:
MyMemory is the world's largest Translation Memory. It has been created collecting TMs from the European Union and United Nations, and aligning the best domain-specific multilingual websites.

We're part of Translated, so if you ever need professional translation services, then go checkout our main site
